channel.title: Comments on: Catch my keynote at Chicago Code Camp 2017!
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Chris Wood
item.dc:creator: Chris Wood
item.description: Just watched the beginning and you are so right. You choose a fantastic subject. I've always thought of SQL Server as a lover and a cancer. I am no where near as busy as you. I'm lucky I have Joan to keep me grounded. Hope to bump into you again somewhere.
item.content:encoded:
Just watched the beginning and you are so right. You choose a fantastic subject. I’ve always thought of SQL Server as a lover and a cancer. I am no where near as busy as you. I’m lucky I have Joan to keep me grounded.
Hope to bump into you again somewhere.

item.title: By: Jes Borland
item.dc:creator: Jes Borland
item.description: Chris, it was fantastic! Not only did they laugh at my jokes, I got really good feedback after. You can watch it at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kFbOWxRmpsE&feature=youtu.be!
item.content:encoded: Chris, it was fantastic! Not only did they laugh at my jokes, I got really good feedback after. You can watch it at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kFbOWxRmpsE&feature=youtu.be!

item.title: By: Chris Wood
item.dc:creator: Chris Wood
item.description: How did it go Jes? Did you knock them dead? Hope you wowed them.
item.content:encoded:
How did it go Jes? Did you knock them dead?
Hope you wowed them.

item.title: By: remou
item.dc:creator: remou
item.description: I get into that state because other busy, overworked, tired people need help. In addition, reading about horrific trauma is not so easy.
item.content:encoded: I get into that state because other busy, overworked, tired people need help. In addition, reading about horrific trauma is not so easy.
